    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"

>
[Quick Identification](/Feats.aspx?ID=5195) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 260 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
trained in [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10), [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11), or [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)

</column>

---

You can Identify Magic swiftly. You take only 1 minute when using Identify Magic to determine the properties of an item, ongoing effect, or location, rather than 10 minutes. If you’re a master, it takes a 3-action activity, and if you’re legendary, it takes 1 action.
name: Quick Identification
prerequisite: trained in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion
